ygData.subject: Decide rules
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I want to write decide-rules that reject resources based on two conditions: content-length and content-type (e.g., text/html resources larger than 10MB,

Hi,

I want to write decide-rules that reject resources based on two condit=
ions: content-length and content-type (e.g., text/html resources larger tha=
n 10MB, and text/plain resources larger than 100KB), but I can't find any w=
ay to logically AND rule subsets together.

Is there a way to write decide-=
rules that would achieve what I want?  Should I be using ScriptedDecideRule=
s?

Thanks (for your patience with a newbie),
Steve
